Plot: Père Goriot is the tragic story of a father whose obsessive love for his two daughters leads to his financial and personal ruin. Interwoven with this theme is that of the impoverished young aristocrat, Rastignac, who came to Paris from the provinces to hopefully make his fortune. He befriends Goriot and becomes involved with the daughters. The story is set against the background of a whole society driven by social ambition and lust for wealth.
Characters: Eugène de Rastignac, Père Goriot, Vautrin, Delphine de Nucingen, Henri de Marsay, Horace Bianchon, Béatrix de Rochefide, Frederic de Nucingen, Anastasie de Restaud, Vicomtesse de Beauseant
